about_the_game:
DLC-exclusive attachment items that allow Adol & Karja to dress up as the Sacred Beast Roo.

Adol's Roo Ear x2
Adol's Roo Tail x2
Karja's Roo Ear x2
Karja's Roo Tail x2

*Open [DLC] under [Items] in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*After receiving items, change costumes via [Equipment] -> [Costumes] in the main menu.
